article_title: Obama Whines About Congress: 'They're Focused on Trying to Mess with Me'
article_body: Before a crowd gathered at the Ford automotive plant in Liberty, Missouri Friday, President Barack Obama lashed out at lawmakers.
comment_texts:
I expected no less from Obama. Time and again, he has proven that he's nothing
but a well spoken, ghetto black man. The president of the
United States is expected to uphold his dignity and that of his office when 
speaking in public, but this man does not possess any dignity. He spoke like
a common thug, which is what he is.
